author: assaf
msg: Removed custom setup task, no longer using it since gems:install works just fine.
Added db:populate task to create fake data in the database (uses Faker gem).
Added run task to start a Thin server and show development log on the console.

author: assaf
msg: Some fixes to how task data is handled in memory.
